item.title: Next year could set a record for M&A. One Wall Street stock stands to benefit most in 2026
item.description: Bank of America sees Goldman Sachs adding 5% as it benefits from a record merger and acquisition cycle next year.

item.title: NextEra to build 15 gigawatts of power for data centers by 2035
item.description: NextEra CEO John Ketchum acknowledged that the huge power demand from AI data centers is raising affordability concerns.

item.title: How to play further gains in copper using options on this mining stock
item.description: Michael Khouw breaks down the moves in copper and how to capitalize with options.

item.title: Bank of America hikes Carvana price target following S&P 500 inclusion announcement
item.description: Bank of America sees shares of Carvana adding 14% from here.

item.title: Netflix gets a downgrade after announcing Warner Bros. film and streaming acquisition
item.description: Analyst Jeffrey Wlodarczak downgraded the streaming stock to a hold rating from buy.
